name: Alien Buddy: Beneath The Surface of a New Mexico Landfill (Download)
name_original: Alien Buddy: Beneath The Surface of a New Mexico Landfill (Download)
description:
Collect the five buried Alien Buddy cartridges while avoiding the authorities.

Controls: Space - Interact(dig icon will appear at top), Arrowkeys - Move
